code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import FileUpload from"../components/FileUpload";import FileList from"../components/FileList";import{listDocuments}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[uploadedFiles,setUploadedFiles]=useState([]);const fetchDocuments=async()=>{try{const documents=await listDocuments();setUploadedFiles(documents);}catch(error){console.error("Failed to fetch documents:",error);}};const handleUploadSuccess=file=>{setUploadedFiles([...uploadedFiles,file]);};const handleDelete=fileId=>{setUploadedFiles(uploadedFiles.filter(file=>file.file_id!==fileId));};useEffect(()=>{fetchDocuments();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-blue-600 text-white py-4 shadow-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center",children:"File Processing Dashboard"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"flex-grow flex flex-col items-center py-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-xl rounded-lg p-8 w-full max-w-6xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileUpload,{onUploadSuccess:handleUploadSuccess}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileList,{files:uploadedFiles,onDelete:handleDelete})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"bg-gray-800 text-white py-4 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm",children:"\xA9 2025 Portfolio App. All rights reserved."})})]});};export default Home;
